titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer to the governing body of the San Carlos Apache Tribe to purchase property within the San Carlos Mineral Strip.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 6/17/1988--Introduced. Requires the transfer within 60 days by the Secretary of the Interior of certain appropriated funds to the governing body of the San Carlos Apache Tribe. States that transferred amounts are to be used for economic development purposes in accordance with a tribal plan. Disallows use of transferred funds for per capita payments to tribal members. Treats transferred funds as non-Federal, private funds of the Tribe.
